entry.title: Fluid Sizing Instead Of Multiple Media Queries?

We don‚Äôt need to use media queries to change the values of some CSS properties ‚Äî *font-size*, *padding*, *margin* etc. ‚Äî depending on the viewport width, with the CSS `clamp` function.
